## Entity.remove() method

Define which fields to remove in the entity

**Signature:**

```typescript
remove(fields: string[]): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fields | string\[\] | An array of string matching the fields to remove |

**Returns:**

this
